Uses of Class
commands.display_commands.SetViewProperties

Packages that use SetViewProperties
commands.display_commands   
 

Uses of SetViewProperties in commands.display_commands
 

Subclasses of SetViewProperties in commands.display_commands
 class PenColor
          Returns the index of the current pen color.
 class SetBackground
          Sets the background color to a color corresponding to the index of that number in the drop down menu where 0 is the first number.
 class SetPenColor
          Sets the color of the pen to the color corresponding to the position, starting at 0, of the color in the drop down menu.
 class SetShape
          Sets the turtle image to the number (starting at 0) corresponding to the image in the drop down turtle image selection menu.
